name: Rebrickable - query data using Serverless SQL Pool

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
CREATE SCHEMA delta
CREATE VIEW V_OwnedSets AS SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://rebrickabledevadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/cleansed/Rebrickable/OwnedSets',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [V_OwnedSets]

CREATE VIEW V_Sets AS SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://rebrickabledevadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/cleansed/Rebrickable/Sets',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [V_Sets]

CREATE VIEW V_Date AS SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://rebrickabledevadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/cleansed/Rebrickable/Date',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [V_Date]

CREATE VIEW V_Profile AS SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://rebrickabledevadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/cleansed/Rebrickable/Profile',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [V_Profile]
